properties.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued January 10 at 10:53AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
There is a potential for flooding or near flooding along the
following rivers and creeks based on forecast average basin rainfall
of generally 3 inches from Friday night through Saturday night.
However...if rainfall amounts are more or less then predicted...
the potential for flooding will increase or decrease accordingly.
If the likelihood of flooding becomes more certain...then a
flood warning would be issued. The storm system is now
beginning to form and river flood warnings will likely
be issued this evening or Saturday morning as it becomes
more likely the large rainfall amounts will occur.
